channel.title: If you could change your MPSC name
channel.description:
If you could change your MPSC name, what would it be, and why?
[b]Myn:[/b] I would change my name to Soharuda. I would change it to this because it is my own word. How do you pernounce it you ask? (So-ha-ru-da), but with a more "Japanesse" feel to it. I will make a small voice later to show everybody. Will be trademarking this later, as it will be the name of my biz.

item.title: If you could change your MPSC name
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Newty:

I had mine changed from ‘newbienewty’ to Newty. Oh how times have changed since I joined this forum :o

Lol, ‘newbienewty’, do I even want to know what inspired that one?

Read full topic

item.title: If you could change your MPSC name
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:28, topic:346047”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=442426.msg3249533#msg3249533 date=1277638883]

Mine was changed.

Noobs.

yo Mod Adam loool.

I demand “fc”…

[/quote]

or adamp[/quote]
LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL

[quote=“Chassy13, post:39, topic:346047”][quote author=Natey link=topic=442426.msg3249875#msg3249875 date=1277665254]
1)stolen mscp name
2)find kids account
3) delete theirs and change yours
4)???
5)Profit?
[/quote]

I PMd Lothy about it, but because the user was active during this year he cannot delete the account (well he can, he just won’t). It doesn’t matter though. :P[/quote]I asked like every admin and Gmod to remove the X from my name, but it’s been since ignored.

“The Reaper” was like active 4 years ago…

Read full topic

ChaosPkers:

than b@n them for being a narb

Teh Pm.

You have been banned for breaching Rule IV, Section(s): 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 ect. all the way to IXXXXXXXXXXX. You will be banned untill Chassy decides to change his name again. Since creating multiple account's is not allowed if you attempt to do so, [B]I WILL KICK YOU IN THE BALLS[/B]

Thats all bro,
Chassy
woz here

GO GO GO GO GO

I’d remove the 13 from my name. I was looking to do it until I realized some poser took the name and won’t answer my e-mails since he was active this year. :mad:
[/quote]

2)find kids account
3) delete theirs and change yours
4)???
